titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices, a proclamation for apprehending William Berkenhead
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lords Justices.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at the council chamber at Whitehall, the one and thirtieth day of August, 1696, in the eighth year of His Majesties reign."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
